title: Per-Tab Circuit Breaker Pattern
details: v1.6.3.10-v5 changed circuit breaker from global to per-Quick Tab scope. Implementation uses Map<quickTabId, { tripped, resetTime }>. When broadcasts fail for one Quick Tab, only that tab's broadcasts are blocked - other tabs unaffected. Key functions: _tryResetPerTabCircuitBreaker(), _isPerTabCircuitBreakerTripped(), _tripPerTabCircuitBreaker(). Cooldown is CIRCUIT_BREAKER_COOLDOWN_MS (1000ms).
